reviewText: The "old style" of anime doesn't bother me but this cheap, cheesy and boring offering does. The censored stuff should be unless you like rape by a multiheaded snake-like thing. Neither I nor the seller knew this version was censored nor was it advertised as such, a real problem for me because if I want something nasty I should be able to get it. This offering is beyond nasty, it is both vulgar and wholey without redeeming value. It is also something I cannot pawn off on anyone and my heirs will have to deal with it. Waste neither your money nor your time.
